td.content: s:a white female aged 32 yrs describes recurrent Kidney over the past month. she does not smoke she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 65 in, Weight 174 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

td.content: s:pt presents with increased Kidney over 15 months. she is a 33 yr old white F. Patient does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 66 in, Weight 178 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Retrograde Pyelogram shown an elongated renal pelvis with low lying uteropelvic junctions, 2 calyces on the right a:Acute Renal Failure p:administered Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 200 cc/gr bolus, performed Retrograde Pyelogram, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
